content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Operation at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (43.0, -82.0) and a chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Coal Storage at position (42.5, -83.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to store coal.

### Coal Storage at position (43.5, -79.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (43.5, -79.5) to store coal.

### Coal Storage at position (44.5, -81.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (44.5, -81.5) to store coal.

### Coal Storage at position (45.5, -80.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (45.5, -80.5) to store coal.

### Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) with a burner inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) to insert coal into the furnace.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Ensure you have the item you are trying to insert in your inventory before attempting insertion.
### Errors when mining with a burner mining drill
- Ensure the drill has fuel before attempting to mine.
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to mine.
### Errors when using a burner inserter
- Ensure the inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to use it.
